column4: What program would you recomend for taking notes in maths/physics? I need something that's easier to organize then open office
actually, if you learn the language of the formula editor in OO.o it's pretty nice
yeah it seems nice, but it's just hard organising lots of notes in it, I was wondering if there was a program like onenote
